version_description:
Set badge on app icon when incoming message on background received
toast, longToast, beep, vibrate messages
Profiles & DomoSpy (Domoticz messages interceptor)
New chart widget
Bug fix

New widget markdown
Double tap on any widget show last status time
New View Settings option “Always show last status time”
text2speech in status messages
user, users, minWidth, maxWidth in config messages
Bug fix
New engine, new design, new widgets.
